code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import styles from'../../styles/Products.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Products=_ref=>{let{title,style={},products=[],amount}=_ref;const list=products.filter((_,i)=>i<amount);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:styles.products,style:style,children:[title&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.list,children:list.map(_ref2=>{let{id,images,title,category:{name:cat},price}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/products".concat(id),className:styles.product,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.image,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(images[0],")")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.wrapper,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:styles.title,children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.cat,children:cat}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.info,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.prices,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.price,children:[price,"$"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.oldPrice,children:[Math.floor(price*1.2),"$"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.purchases,children:[Math.floor(Math.random()*20+1)," purchased"]})]})]})]},id);})})]});};export default Products;
